column3: Faculty of Social Science & Public Policy
column5: The MSc Global Affairs examines the politics, society, economics and history of the world’s non-western, regional and rising powers and their role within a changing world order.Visit our online hubs for content, news and events about the African Leadership Centre
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: Full-time: One year; part-time: two years
